import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../FormEstilos/formAddMarca.css'; import { agregarMarcaApi } from "../../../Api/Sistema/marcas"; export default function FormAddMarca() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ codigo: "", nombre: "", nacionalidad: "", cedulaJuridica: "", nombreEmpesa: "", detalleEmpresa: "", telefono: "123", descripcion: "", fotoMarca: "", fotoEmpresa: "" }); const changeForm = e => { if (e.target.name !== "fileMarca" || e.target.name !== "fileProvee") { setInputs({ ...inputs, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } }; const reader2 = new FileReader(); const reader = new FileReader(); const fileSelectedHandler = e => { const i = document.getElementById("imgMarca"); const y = e.target.files[0]; i.src = URL.createObjectURL(e.target.files[0]); console.log(e.target); inputs.fotoMarca = reader.readAsDataURL(y); reader.onload = function () { inputs.fotoMarca = reader.result; }; console.log(inputs); } const fileSelectedHandler2 = e => { const i = document.getElementById("imgProv"); const y = e.target.files[0]; i.src = URL.createObjectURL(e.target.files[0]); console.log(e.target); inputs.fotoEmpresa = reader2.readAsDataURL(y); reader2.onload = function () { inputs.fotoEmpresa = reader2.result; }; console.log(inputs); } const show = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const result = agregarMarcaApi(inputs); } return (
